tools.webcam
Interface WebcamTool

All Known Implementing Classes:
WebcamJavaCV, WebcamJMYRON
public interface WebcamTool

Builds an connection to the webcam when initialized. Returns a medium if one was recognized by calling the getMedium method.

Author:
jonas

Method Summary
 void closeConnection()
          Closes the connection to the webcam
 Medium getMedium()
          Gets an picture from the webcam and searches for qr-codes in it.
 void openConnection()
          Opens the connection to the webcam
 void setCamera(int index)
          Selects the camera
 

Method Detail

getMedium

Medium getMedium()
                 throws CameraException
Gets an picture from the webcam and searches for qr-codes in it. If one is recognized the information is read and it will look for the linked medium in the database.

Returns:
Medium whose qr code was found in the frame caught by the webcam
Throws:
CameraException

setCamera

void setCamera(int index)
               throws CameraException
Selects the camera

Parameters:
index - the camera index,0 is the internal camera,1 is e.g. an external USB-camera if there is a internal camera, otherwise it might also be 0 for the external camera
Throws:
CameraException

openConnection

void openConnection()
                    throws CameraException
Opens the connection to the webcam

Throws:
CameraException

closeConnection

void closeConnection()
                     throws CameraException
Closes the connection to the webcam

Throws:
CameraException
